/* eslint-disable react/no-array-index-key */ import React from 'react'; import { Card, Col, Button, ButtonToolbar, Table, CardBody, } from 'reactstrap'; const invoiceData = [ { title: 'Wordpress Plugin Apollo 200', quantity: 1, cost: 27 }, { title: 'Easy Pro Admin Template', quantity: 1, cost: 59 }, { title: 'Spirit HTML Template', quantity: 2, cost: 20 }, ]; const InvoiceTemplate = () => (

West Chicago,

IL 60185

Maria Morris

Project Manager at BLX

mariam@company.co

West Chicago, IL 60185

{invoiceData.map((i, index) => ( ))}
# Item Name Quantity Unit Cost Total
{index + 1} {i.title} {i.quantity} ${i.cost} ${i.quantity * i.cost}

Sub - Total amount: $126.00

VAT: $20.00

Grand Total: $146.00

); export default InvoiceTemplate;
